mapper.select: select id, open_id, court_id, arena_id, date, start, end, fee, charged, update_time from tt_booking where date = #{date} and arena_id = #{arenaId}

select a.id, a.open_id, a.date, a.court_id, a.start, a.end, a.fee, a.charged, a.update_time, b.nickname, b.wx_nickname, b.avatar, b.vip, d.open_id as share_user_open_id, d.nickname as share_user_nickname, d.wx_nickname as share_user_wx_nickname, d.avatar as share_user_avatar, d.vip as share_user_vip from tt_booking a inner join tt_user b on a.open_id = b.open_id left join booking_share c on a.id = c.booking_id left join tt_user d on c.open_id = d.open_id where a.arena_id = #{arenaId} and a.date >= #{start} and a.date <= #{end} and a.status = 'ok'
select ifnull(sum(end - start + 1), 0) from tt_booking where open_id = #{openId} and (date > #{date} or (date = #{date} and start >= #{start}))
